context: What kind of movies do you like?
I love it all but I am kind of in the mood for a romantic comedy. Is there any chance you have something you could suggest?
When Harry Met Sally... (1989) is a great classic! Another good one is Love Actually (2003) . Have you seen those?
I have seen the first one but not the secondd.
I will have to check it out for sure.
resp: And Forgetting Sarah Marshall (2008) is really funny!
